definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: become straight (NH [[תִּקֵּן]] arrange, put right; Sir 47:9 [[תיקן]] set in order ; As. takânu, be well ordered, esp. Pi. as NH; Aram. tqen be established, firm, Pa. taqen, [[תֵּקֵּין]] fix, arrange, prepare, etc.; Palm. Pa. erect);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לְתַקֵּן]] Ec 7:13 make straight (opp. [[עִוׇּה]]); Pf. 3 ms. [[תִּקֵּן]] Ec 12:9 put straight, arrange in order (proverbs).
